headline: Medtronic Delivers on FY25 Sustainability Targets and Charts Path to 2030

headline: Revolutionizing Cardiology: Robots, AI, and Innovations at the Heart of Change
summary: The next-generation intervention cardiology sector is experiencing a transformative shift, leveraging precision-guided, minimally invasive techniques to address complex cardiovascular conditions like coronary artery disease and structural heart defects. This field integrates robotics, AI-powered imaging, and advanced devices, marking a significant move away from traditional open-heart surgeries. headline: Medtronic initiates U.S. IDE clinical study evaluating Hugo™ robotic-assisted surgery system for gynecological procedures
summary: Medtronic plc (NYSE: MDT) today announced the start of the Embrace Gynecology investigational device exemption (IDE) U.S. clinical study to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of its Hugo™ robotic-assisted surgery (RAS) system in robotic-assisted gynecological procedures.
